body:
Comment 17: 
I noticed https://golang.org/issue/2605 was merged into this issue.

Is the plan still to: 
- remove the -path parameter
- support GOPATH, and include its contents under both the Packages and Commands sections
i.e.
  - any src/cmd/* is assumed to be a command (containing main and optionally documentation packages)
  - any other src/* is assumed to be a package

If so, is it fair to have https://golang.org/issue/3046 merged into
it?

Noticed that rcostu started a CL for it (which touched just a part of the issue), but
there has been no update in about a week. If there are no takers, I can discuss a
solution and put together a CL for the composite solution (covering the 3 issues 2234,
2605 and 3046).
